title:
Koszul duality for generalized steinberg representations of $p$-adic
  groups
abstract:
In this paper we prove a novel result on two categories that appear in the
local Langlands correspondence, for generalized Steinberg representations. Let
$G$ be a semisimple reductive group split over a $p$-adic field $F$. The main
result of this paper shows that category of modules over the extension algebra
of generalized Steinberg representations of $G(F)$ appears as a full
subcategory of equivariant perverse sheaves on the variety of Langlands
parameters for these representations.
